title: Closing Rnk For CS EC Campus
content: What was the rnk at which CSE EC Campus closed at?? Seeing the large difference in demand bw aiml rr campus and cse campus got me worried if i made the wrong choice as Im really worried bout the peer group.

comments.body:
Judging your peer group based on JEE rank is very biased. Once you join, you will find a mixed bag of people: people with very low JEE ranks getting 9+ CGPA and also people with high JEE ranks struggling to cross an 8 CGPA. You cannot use JEE/PCM scores to project how your batch will perform. Odds are, if you are interested and have a genuine passion for your branch, you will do really well in it, regardless of whatever you scored in JEE.

The reason people prefer RR over EC has been documented in the FAQs. Please read and educate yourself.
3400 aiml ec and 2200 aiml rr

Hard to say, gotta take your chances
